Text.val: Author: Christian Overhoff
Creation: 02.03.2005
With this module it is possible to handle a single debtor.
The module works on virtuell fields and memory tables.
Locking the debtor is done in table CRDB, in case a record is found, only!

unlock the debtor and
write debtor into the handled table,so that the user can retrieve it later:

Exit this module:

Comment.val: This moduls shows and handles all data of one specific debtor.

Explaination of the windows-position&size-handling:
Basically there is the problem, that Magic repaints the whole window whenever it shows one more line of the table!! If just the dimension-variable are in the properties, this behaviour results in the effect, that the window is always repainted in it's original dimensions, whenever a vertical resize is done by the user (because this forces repainting of the table, and it's line, so that the window is repainted with the old variables values!)
To cover this and take the GUI-window-dimensions, the varset-function saves the new GUI-size first into the variable and after that it uses the values from the file.

Text.val: HINT: There is a horizontal minimize stopper in the screen
in the upper, almost right corner.
Link condition used!:
"Forward"-Mode will stop "double-ESC" after reentering the table (in backward):
OID705D: Debtor notepad:
Enter the table:
Default: (for ESC) is Cancel:
(Default is used in the RS also!)
Default is to continue the calling loop (Cancel-Button will stop it):
Enable printing the screen:
Switch off printing screen button:
Show table of invoice details on the screen:
Reset the start-flag:
Show sub-tasks' tables:
(In this special case, the "Invoice details" need not to be called here, because
the call in the RM is the FIRST operation in the RM anyway!)
Show dunning history:
:End: Start-Block
First finish to paint the whole screen...
... then set cursor to normal:
After CANCEL-BUTTON or ESC-key or SKIP-BUTTON
see if any field was changed and in that case, ask fo confirmation:
Search for additional changes, if not found some changes before already:
If any changes happened, ask for confirmation of cancelation:
If changes where done, ask to discard the changes:
if the answer was: discard changes, then go back to Main:
Reset default behaviour:
Set back to default value:
:End: Stop of cancelation process
:End: any changes done already?
:End: CANCEL-BUTTON + SKIP-BUTTON
Save virtuell fields:
Save present value of combo- and checkboxes:
Handler DEBTORACTION:
If any entry='' is in debtoraction, then e-mail and fax are not allowed and
this handler sets them to false:
Handler CLIENTACTION:
If any entry='' is in clientaction, then e-mail and fax are not allowed and
this handler sets them to false:
Handler OTHERSACTION:
If any entry='' is in othersaction, then e-mail and fax are not allowed and
this handler sets them to false:
FAX NO checkbox was changed to "unchecked":
Delete any prior FaxNo:
FAX NO checkbox was changed to "checked":
Check for FAX NO of contact person:
Fax number does not exist, modify details of the contact person of this debtor!:
So, there is a FAX NO, but ask, if it is the correct one:
Is this the fax number to be used ?
Save FAX NO, if answer was "Yes":
:End: Check for FAX NO of contact person
:End FAX NO checkbox changed to "unchecked"/"checkd"
E-mail checkbox was changed to "unchecked":
Delete any prior e-mail adress:
e-mail checkbox was changed to "checked":
Check for e-mail of contact person:
e-mail does not exist, modify details of the contact person of this debtor:
So, there is a e-mail adress, but ask, if it is the correct one:
Is this the e-mail address to be used?: %1
Save e-mail address, if answer was "Yes":
:End: check for e-mail of contact person
:End: E-mail checkbox was changed to "unchecked"/"checked"
If FAX checkbox is checked, then search for fax-nbr:
No fax no available or selected by the user => Error message+reset checkbox:
:End: No Fax-no available
:End: checkbox checked
If EMAIL checkbox is checked, then search for e-mail-adress:
No e-mail available or selected by the user => Error message+reset checkbox:
:End: No e-mail available
:End: EMAIIL checkbox checked
Remember old value, just in case of an error the date has to be reset:
Date mandatory! Legal collection is set for this debtor!
Reset date to the old value after an error message:
A date in the past is not allowed:
New agenda date must be entered
Date must not be more than 30 days in the future for code =1 and 2
Date must not be more than 90 days in the future code = 3
Date must not be more than 365 days in the future for code = 5
If the agenda date is entered and there exists a row in DUNNING_HISTORY
If text has already been modified, save the changes in the field:
Call the "Show notice" subtask then:
move the cursor the the end of the textfield in the show notice subtask:
This handler is called by the F6-Handler on DRCM_NOTICE:

Comment.val: If a button is hit in a subtask (like invoice details or dunning history he sends a User Action 3 and sets the variable to the related value. Then here the "real event" is raised. This is necessary because of multi screen environment and the mouse will to enter the screen again if the subbutton raised the event itself directly

ExpSyntax.val: IF (HitZOrdr ()=102,'FALSE'LOG,{0,23}='Y' AND {0,118} AND ISNULL ({0,116}) AND ISNULL ({0,113}) OR {0,113}<=Date ())

Text.val: REMARK: Deferred Transaction is necessary for "Marking rows" option in table!
ATTENTION: Range Expression used!
HINT: The screen contains an "invisible" (= very small) horizontal minimaze stop
in the upper right corner (stops the table object from getting too small)
Sort criteria:
Default sorting by duedate:
Days = INVO_DUEDATE - INVO_INVDATE
Delay = date() - INVO_DUEDATE
RANGE Magic SQL expression! INVO_AACTUALI <> 0:
RANGE EXPRESSION for Return values!
Dispute (field can be changed!):
Magic Range Exp! <>0:
if INVO_LINENO = 0 then this invoice have not been booked in via a schedule.
This invoices sould presented above the rest .
also if invoce is an "Interest note" (INVO_MARKCODESPEC=45)
it sould be presented above the rest.
leave the table after the last field of a line:
STEP-Mode! It shall not exit, when just going to another line.
Especially it shall not "exit" after a change in the line was done and the user
just goes to another table line afterwards
Better impression, when reentering the screen by a click into the window:
Default: Switch off the all-invoices button:
(But not, if invoices had been found earlier already (see SCR 10346):
Remember present invoice for correct positioning on next start:

Text.valUnicode: There are already agenda dates for this debtor in the future.

Text.val: This task is just and only needed because of the multi-window-interface!
It doesn't do anything, but it improves the handling of the document-windows.
The document windows can be called from 2 tasks:
Either from this son-task (OID705E Dunning History) or
from the parallel task OID706F2 All dunning history)
In both tasks the document windows shall be accessible and shall be refreshed
for every line change in the dunning history table.
There the doc window needs to be "related" (=opened/called) by the active
dunning history programm (either 705E or 706F2)
If this calling task would not exist, then Magic doesn't close the
document window called from 706F2 (if opened before upon user request)
and if it opens it's own doc window, there would exist an old ghost doc window
from 706F2, that cannot be accessed (cannot get the focus anymore)
With this calling task, Magic automatically closes that ghost task + window
when it opens its own new doc window from within 705E
Save last row-position in the table:
-- Determine if scans / documents / notes / duning letters have to be presented
... scanned documents present
... notes present
... perhaps also Tamino documents
... dunning letters present
... tamino documents present
-- Close previous screens
-- Refresh display of notes and dunning letters (= internal online programs)
Call all refresh
I.) Open all those document windows, that are necessary, close the others:
CALLPROG note (return parameter!):
if document available but window close or no document available but window open:
CALLPROG dunning_letter (return parameter!):
if document available but window close or no document available but window open:

Text.val: This task calculates the totals per line, depending on the present sort.
Everytime, the user changes the sort-field, the sums are recalculated.
In addition, the subtotal (and currency) of all marked fields
are being calculated.
RANGE Magic SQL expression! INVO_AACTUALI <> 0:
The only changeable field comes from memory table
If sorted by due date or inv date (default),the line no is the higher criteria:
In case of sort of currency, the 3 letters have to be converted to a number:
Sort criteria:
Init old Currency in the first record loop with the first currency:
Stop counting with the first deviating currency:
if currencies aren't mixed, then add another amount:
if a deviating currency appeared, the rest of subtotals has to be deleted:
Save present subtotal into the table row:
Was a marking command given? Yes => process the block:
Mark all:
Mark all rows of 1 currency:
Give hint, if there are also other currencies:
:END: Mark all
Unmark all:
:END Unmark all
Mark all up to row
Mark the row, if not already behind the row:
Check equal currencies up to the row:
From present row (excluding) on, stop marking:
Mark all from row on:
Start marking from the present row on:
If a row above the present row had been marked already before,
or if the marking is started now,
than its currency is the one to remember and to count for:
Mark a row, if the currency fits::
:END: Marking command
Marked row? Yes => process the block:
Save currency:
Total must be calculated, only, if all values have the same currency:

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast (sum (ifnull(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTINVDATE,0)) as decimal(15,2)) SUM_INVDATE, cast (sum (ifnull(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTDUEDATE,0)) as decimal(15,2)) SUM_DUEDATE, cast (sum(ifnull (DCMO_PAIDAMOUNT,0) - ifnull(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTDISPUTES,0) - ifnull(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTPARTIALPAYM,0)) as decimal(15,2)) SUM_DIFFERENCE from :4/dcmo where DCMO_DEBC_NO = :1 and DCMO_CURRENCY = ':2' and DCMO_YEAR = :3 for fetch only

Text.val: DIRECT SQL-TASK!
Sums values in SQL directly and calculates the results in Magic then:
Calculate days of INVdate: (Cnd: Don't divide by zero):
Calculate days of DUEdate: (Cnd: Don't divide by zero):
Minimum is zero:

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select cast (sum (ifnull(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTINVDATE,0)) as decimal(15,2)) SUM_INVDATE, cast (sum (ifnull(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTDUEDATE,0)) as decimal(15,2)) SUM_DUEDATE, cast (sum(ifnull (DCMO_PAIDAMOUNT,0) - ifnull(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTDISPUTES,0) - ifnull(DCMO_PAIDAMOUNTPARTIALPAYM,0)) as decimal(15,2)) SUM_DIFFERENCE from :4/dcmo INNER JOIN :4/debc ON DCMO_DEBC_NO=DEBC_NO and DEBC_DEBH=:1
where DCMO_CURRENCY = ':2' and DCMO_YEAR = :3
for fetch only

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DEBP_FAX FROM :1/DEBP, :1/DEPT WHERE DEBP_DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE and DEBP_DEBH_NO=:2 and DEBP_FAX<>'' and length(trim(DEBP_FAX))>8 and (DEBP_DEBC_NO=:3 or DEBP_DEBC_NO=0) and DEPT_INCASSODEPARTMENT = 'Y' ORDER by DEBP_DEBC_NO DESC, DEBP_NO

SELECT DEBP_EMAIL FROM :1/DEBP, :1/DEPT WHERE DEBP_DEPT_CODE = DEPT_CODE and DEBP_DEBH_NO=:2 and DEBP_EMAIL<>'' and length(trim(DEBP_EMAIL))>8 and DEBP_EMAIL like '%@%' and (DEBP_DEBC_NO=:3 or DEBP_DEBC_NO=0) and DEPT_INCASSODEPARTMENT = 'Y' ORDER by DEBP_DEBC_NO DESC, DEBP_NO

Text.val: -- This is a special program for client 1-1636 (Olympia) to send excel files to
a national account.
This program has to be called outside the transaction to perform the rest of
of the updates, see below. For some reason the deletion/update of the credman
tables is also performed outside any transaction)
Continuous dunning
-- If an XML error occured in OID705G, skip the further updates
(AK SCR12242)
After handling the debtor and pressing the 'OK' button we check if there is an
active advice for the debtor in the 'advice chain'. If we find an advice we
delete it. even if the program (OID705) was not called within
the advice chain.
